title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 326.3 - Co-esc contribution fund and accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 326.3 - Co-esc contribution fund and accounts

State Regulations
A special fund known as the CO-ESC contribution fund is
hereby established for the purpose of receiving such member contributions. This
fund shall contain all monies received on account of CO-ESC contributions which
have been deducted from members' wages. Subsidiary accounts within this fund
for individual members shall be established and designated CO-ESC contributions
accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
326.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
